posts.post_content:
Dell Darling, arms folded PSA 2(MK) – sold
Tom Lovett, hands chest high PSA 1 – pulled

Shipping is priced in.

PSA has only graded four Lovett cards overall, and only two of this one.

Let me know if you have any questions.

W


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

A hotel chain?

Washington if purple, Wisconsin if red?

Tungsten?
